description: This file defines the NoteMappers class, which contains static helper functions for converting lists of maps or JSON data into lists of Note objects and vice versa. It supports data serialization and deserialization, particularly for database query results and API payloads in a Flutter/Dart project.

classes.name: NoteMappers
classes.description: A utility class providing static methods to convert between JSON/map data and Note objects, facilitating data handling for persistence and API communication.

methods.name: fromIterable
methods.description: Converts an iterable of dynamic items (e.g., from database query results) into a list of Note objects.

methods.name: toMapList
methods.description: Converts a list of Note objects into a list of maps suitable for storage or transmission.

methods.name: toJsonList
methods.description: Converts a list of Note objects into a list of JSON-serializable maps.
